rules.natural: Provided that popcorn is heated, it follows that popcorn is ready.
Either popcorn is placed in the microwave or it is placed in the toaster.
Whenever popcorn is placed in the toaster, it becomes heated.
In the event that margarine is heated, margarine is liquid.
If wood polish is on the table, then wood polish is flammable.
Provided that wood polish is on the table, wood polish is combustible.
Either wood polish is on the table, or, if margarine is heated then margarine is melted.
Given that wood polish is in the cabinet, wood polish is not on the table.
Wood polish is in the cabinet or wood polish is in the garage.
Provided that wood polish is in the garage, then wood polish is not on the table.
If water is spilled, then water is not cleaned up.
Assuming water is mopped, then if water is spilled, water is cleaned up.
Water is dried or water is mopped.
Water is evaporated or water is not dried.
Whenever wood polish is combustible, wood polish is dangerous.
On the condition that wood polish is dangerous, wood polish is hazardous.
If margarine is a dairy product, then whenever popcorn is placed in the microwave, popcorn is cooking.
In the event that margarine is spreadable, margarine is a dairy product.
Under the condition that margarine is yellow, margarine is spreadable.
Margarine is in the fridge or margarine is on the counter.
Provided that margarine is on the counter, then if margarine is butter, margarine is yellow.
Assuming margarine is cold, then if margarine is in the fridge, it follows that if margarine is butter, margarine is yellow.
Margarine is at room temperature or margarine is cold.
Given that margarine is opened, margarine is used.
Provided that margarine is unopened, then if margarine is liquid, margarine is melted.
Under the condition that margarine is new, margarine is opened.
Whenever margarine is old, margarine is unopened.
If margarine is purchased, then margarine is new or margarine is old.
Margarine is expensive, or margarine is discounted, or margarine is on sale, or margarine is purchased.
